name: Psikyo Collection Vol. 1
summary: Arc System Works has announced Psikyo Collection Vol. 1 for Switch, which includes the currently available Nintendo eShop titles Strikers 1945 for Nintendo Switch, Sol Divide: Sword of Darkness for Nintendo Switch, Samurai Aces for Nintendo Switch, and Gunbird for Nintendo Switch. Currently, it has only been confirmed for release in Korea in 2018.
